technologies.name: Windows Server
technologies.description: Windows Server is a brand name for a group of server operating systems.

technologies.name: Application Request Routing
technologies.description: Application Request Routing (ARR) is an extension to Internet Information Server (IIS), which enables an IIS server to function as a load balancer.

technologies.name: IIS
technologies.description: Internet Information Services (IIS) is an extensible web server software created by Microsoft for use with the Windows NT family.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.
